result.execSummary:
The defendant Gavin R Smith was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Possess Drug Paraphernalia, an unclassified misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 961.573(1).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

supervisions.notes: Court costs are waived. DNA costs are due within 30 days

result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Gavin R Smith

records.descr: Records of prosec. are converted data. See file.

records.addlTxt:
Defendant Gavin R Smith in court with attorney Patrick Kiernan Cafferty.  Defendant Gavin R Smith in custody.  Erika Frank Motsch appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Court Reporter: Darlene Shue.

State files amended information. Upon pl to both amended counts in 16CF125; sentence left to the court, conc with revocation. $2,120.00 in restitution stipulated. In 16CM128, pl to charge w/o repeater
P-G to all
COP filed, rights given
the deft waives right to JT
the State relies on comp for FB - defense stipulates to same
finding of guilt

BTC: guilty as above. 16CF125, 9 mos RCJ/CFTS. restitution - $2,120.00 to victim in 16CF125 to be reduced to civil judgment, DNA costs due w/in 30 days. Costs are waived. FTP - 1 day RCJ for every $50 owed
                 16CM128; 3 mos RCJ, conc with revocation, DNA costs only, court costs are waived. 30 dtp. FTP - 1 day RCJ for every $50 owed.

Defendant Gavin R Smith in court with Patrick Kiernan Cafferty.  Lillian V. Lewis appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Court Reporter: Elizabeth Kiel.
Defense requests adjournment for consolidation. 
BTC: Control date set  Hearing scheduled for August 23, 2016 at 08:30 am.
Status conference on June 6, 2016 at 08:30 am.

Attorney Patrick Kiernan Cafferty in court.  Lillian V. Lewis appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Court Reporter: Elizabeth Kiel.
Defendant has a pending felony. 
BTC: Matter is adjourned  Status conference scheduled for June 6, 2016 at 08:30 am.

Pre-trial conference at 02-18-2016 03:15 pm.
Status conference at 03-15-2016 08:30 am.

Charges per attached criminal complaint. Conditions:  It is a condition of this bond that the defendant NOT consume or possess any controlled substances.  This is to be monitored by random UA's and/or breathalyzers.  The defendant is to report directly to Zimmerman Consulting Inc. (ZCI) for monitoring - report to 524 Main Street, Suite 302, Racine, WI  53403 (third floor of the Monument Square Building) or call (262)632-1780 to immediately schedule an appointment.   The defendant is further ordered to report for testing after each court appearance.  Make all court appearances on time.  Failure to appear will result in the issuance of a warrant for your arrest, possible bail jumping charges and forfeiture of any bond on deposit.

Defendant Gavin R Smith in court with attorney Trisha Janet Fritz.  Defendant Gavin R Smith in custody.  Lillian V. Lewis appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Court Reporter: Pat Phinisee.  Reading of complaint is waived, probable cause found, p-ng, bond set.  Pre-trial conference scheduled for February 18, 2016 at 03:15 pm.  Status conference scheduled for March 15, 2016 at 08:30 am.
